hooks.command: jq -r '.transcript_path' | xargs -I{} cat {} | jq -c 'select(.type == "user" and (has("toolUseResult") | not)) | {prompt:.message.content}' | tail -n 1 | jq -c --arg notifier $OWATTAYO_NOTIFIER '. + {notifier:$notifier}' | curl --connect-timeout 5 -X POST http://owattayo:8000/notify -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d @-
